SEARCH
Package Entities

Class Frog

java.lang.Object
Entities.Entity
Entities.Frog
All Implemented Interfaces:
MovingEntity, ScoreEntity
public class Frog extends Entity implements ScoreEntity, MovingEntity
The Frog class represents a frog entity in the game. It implements ScoreEntity and MovingEntity interfaces.
